subject: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
International Credit Control Office
Mobolaji Bank Anthoney Way ,
Federal Capital Territory Abuja [FCT]
Our Ref: CBN/FGN/VO.01/011=17
From The Desk of : MALLAM IBRAHIM BUARI
DIRECTOR INTL CREDIT CONTROL OFFICE CODE: HONESTY
Dated 24TH FEBUARY  2024
DEAR   
Good  Day and how are you doing with your families?
Please  we want to notify you today base the meeting held with the new
CBN Governor instructed by the new Nigeria  head of states today
stated that all pending foreign funds has to leave central bank
account for final payment to any genuine beneficiary  with prove of
ownership Of Funds such as below
1- DRUG LAW CERTIFICATE
2= MONEY LAUNDRY CERTIFICATE
3 = ANTI- TERRORIST CERTIFICATE
4= CLEAN BILL OF FUNDS CERTIFICATE
Now we want to confirm from you if you are still interested to claim
your funds with this bank and  fill the waiver that we have to send to
you and only you pay for the waiver fee of $350 dollars and no other
cent you are to pay and claim your funds
Get back to us to confirm
I am yours sincerely,
MALLAM IBRAHIM BUARI
DIRECTOR, INTERNATIONAL CREDIT CONTROL OFFICE (CBN]
Central Bank Of Nigeria (CBN)

subject: Re:   CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
Hello Mallam Ibrahim Buari,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your time in reaching out to me regarding this matter. It's quite interesting to hear about the new directives from the Central Bank of Nigeria.

Could you please provide more details about these funds? For instance, how did my name come up in relation to them? Also, could you explain a bit more about the waiver fee and what it covers?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Thelma

subject: Re: PLEASE COMPLY NOW
body:

Thank you for your detailed response. I'm quite intrigued by the process you've outlined for the release of funds. However, I have a few questions that I hope you could help me understand better.

Firstly, could you please explain what these documents are - DRUG LAW, MONEY LAUNDRY, TERRORIST, CLEAN BILL OF FUNDS? How do they relate to the transfer of funds?

Secondly, regarding the waiver fee that needs to be paid, could you provide more details about it? What exactly is this waiver for and why is there a need for it?

Lastly, once all these steps are completed and the waiver fee is paid, how long would it take for the funds to be transferred into my account?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thelma

subject: Re: PLEASE COMPLY NOW AND NO MORE QUESTIONS AGAIN FROM YOU PLS
body:
Good Morning Mallam Ibrahim Buari,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your detailed explanation regarding the waiver fee and stamp duty. It's quite a new concept for me, but I'm slowly getting the hang of it.

Just to clarify, you mentioned that I won't have to pay any bank charges or transfer charges once these fees are settled, correct? That sounds like a good deal.

Also, could you please explain more about the waiver documents? What kind of information do they contain and why is it necessary for me to fill them out?

You also mentioned something about sending my data such as full name and address along with my bank account details. While I understand that this might be necessary for the transaction, I am a bit hesitant about sharing such sensitive information online. Is there any other way we can ensure the security of my personal details?

Lastly, you asked if I am ready to send the waiver fee and stamp duty fee now. Could you please provide more details on how exactly should I go about doing this? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thelma

subject: Re: PLEASE COMPLY NOW AND NO MORE QUESTIONS AGAIN FROM YOU PLS
body:
Good Morning Mallam Ibrahim Buari,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your detailed explanation regarding the waiver fee and stamp duty. It's quite a complex process, isn't it? 

I'm curious about how these fees work. Could you please explain more about what the waiver fee and stamp duty are used for? Also, why is it necessary to send them to Nigeria specifically?

You mentioned that Eric in Republic of Ireland will secure the clearance. How does he fit into this process? Is he also part of the Central Bank Of Nigeria?

Lastly, I understand that my data will be used for transferring funds and sending copies. However, I am not comfortable sharing my bank account details over email due to security reasons. Is there another way we can proceed without me having to share such sensitive information?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thelma

Also, you mentioned that Eric will secure the clearance in the Republic of Ireland. May I know who Eric is and what his role is in this process? 

Regarding my personal data, I understand that it's necessary for the bank transfer. However, due to security reasons, I prefer not to share my full name, address or bank account details over email. Is there any other secure way we can proceed with this?

Lastly, could you please provide more information on how Western Union Money Transfer or Money Gram works? This is my first time hearing about them.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thelma

subject: Re: FINAL EXPLAINATION AND NO MORE SO LET US MOVE FORWARD NOW
body:
Hello Mallam Ibrahim Buari,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the time and effort you've put into explaining the process to me. I must admit, some of this is a bit over my head, but I'm trying my best to understand.

You mentioned a waiver fee that needs to be sent to Nigeria. Could you please clarify what exactly this fee is for? And why does it need to be sent through Western Union?

Also, you mentioned something about Eric securing clearance from Ireland. Who is Eric and how is he involved in this process? 

I apologize if my questions seem repetitive or unnecessary. I just want to make sure I fully understand everything before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thelma

subject: Re: FINAL EXPLAINATION AND NO MORE SO LET US MOVE FORWARD NOW
body:
Hello Mallam Ibrahim Buari,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the time and effort you've put into explaining the process to me. I must admit, some of this is a bit over my head, but I'm trying my best to understand.

You mentioned a waiver fee that needs to be sent through Western Union. Could you please explain what this fee is for? And why does it need to be sent via Western Union?

Also, you mentioned something about opening a new bank account if I can't send my current bank account details. Why would I need to open a new account? Is there any specific type of account that should be opened?

Lastly, could you please elaborate on the role of Eric in securing clearance from Ireland? How does his work affect my funds?

I apologize if these questions seem repetitive or unnecessary. As I said earlier, some of this is quite new to me and I just want to make sure I fully understand everything before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thelma
